Name: HEPTAGON
About the game: HEPTAGON is a fast-paced and fluid action game, inspired by the legendary masterpiece Super Hexagon . Aiming to provide a fresh challenge for veterans of the genre, HEPTAGON introduces perspective-shifting effects that bring a new layer of complexity, and also look pretty damn dope. Dodge and twist your way through 7 mind-bending levels, each with its own awesome soundtrack. Compete on global leaderboards for the highest score. Impress your friends with your now-godlike reaction speeds!
